title: Welcome hello
content: I have created this simple app as a way for people to create and share slides on DAT. The idea in my ind is that this or app like this could be a good way to share and distribute slide decks used at conferences and gatherings.

title: How to use?
content: Simply fork the website in Beaker browser and edit the slides.json file. To add additional slides copy one of blocks as shown in the screenshot on the next slide
